attributes.action: Detain and put on trial those politicians who voted for the failed and cruel Badger Cull.
attributes.additional_details: It has been reported that the cull failed to meet its target and that badgers were treated inhumanely.  Politicians, therefore, perpetrated cruelty against wild animals which is illegal and they should be held to account for it, in the same way they would insist on that treatment for anybody who is not a politician who caused immense and inhuman suffering to a wild animal.  Politicians MUST NOT be seen to be above the law of the land.
